[{'date': '2025-10-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Great for all involved', 'content': 'This is a great app for everyone and is helping me get back to myself! Affirmations provided all day long!', 'author': 'Lost SL', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-12', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Awesome', 'content': 'This app helps me know I can do this', 'author': 'Bodh DCCC hejsn DCCC bdbdbd', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-12', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Not free', 'content': 'If you want to pay', 'author': 'MJ 5678', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-11', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Keeps me positive!', 'content': 'These reminders keep me on track to keep moving forward and not get distracted by negative thoughts!', 'author': 'cofmt', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-11', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Refund', 'content': 'I wanted to purchase the monthly subscription first before I committed to a year. But when I paid it charged me for the full year so I canceled instantly, but all it did was just fake my money and the app away. I would like a refund so hopefully someone will get in touch with me. I enjoyed the app from what I saw. Very cute.', 'author': 'Rose5615', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-11', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Lock Screen?', 'content': 'That‚Äôs what made me want this app. I don‚Äôt see anything on my lock screen. Also, I‚Äôd like to hear the affirmations.', 'author': 'andy8803', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-10', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing but could have better futures!!', 'content': 'Hi!

I love this app it helped me so much through the hard times I was having I think the futures that would help it a lot better or maybe that they can be videos in like like some dances and like where you can comment and stuff kind of like TikTok, but not like TikTok and like sweet comments like where you can only click on the comments and not say rude things and you can post a few things but not like bad things like good things to help people and other stuff like that

Edit please make it a little more like TikTok, please', 'author': 'City to', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-10', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Very Helpful', 'content': 'I never write reviews, but this app has really improved my mental health. I get notifications three times a day, and it improves my mood, reminds me to be grateful.', 'author': 'SallyxMx', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-10', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Refreshing', 'content': 'Refreshing and thoughtful reminders of our own worthiness and potential.', 'author': 'nope at B no oo', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-09', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Exceptional tool to use', 'content': 'I use this app to help gain a confidence boost day to day.', 'author': 'sundropsintherain', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-08', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I TRULY AM', 'content': 'Love the app, life changer', 'author': 'Next to my platinum card', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-08', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'great affirmations, annoying notifs', 'content': 'loved this app bc of the notifications i used to get with the great positive affirmations‚Ä¶ now the ONLY notifications i get are about buying premium or ‚Äòsaving my streak‚Äô‚Ä¶ had to turn the notifications off. keeping the app for the widget, but exploring other options.', 'author': 'KanekiTheBrat', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-08', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I was charged', 'content': 'I was charged $14.99 even though I only signed up for the free trial. I do not see any way of getting my money back. This app is a very shady.', 'author': 'KristyJuke', 'version': '6.4.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Highly Recommend', 'content': 'I am not a bot! I really like this appüò≠ and if you were a friend or loved one of mine I would pitch this to you for your OWN benefit. We are in this journey of self improvement together and there is nothing you would be able to do about thatüòå Now, for my demure response, I use I am every day. It‚Äôs been a great tool for helping me set the tone for the day. I like that I can swipe within a specific category to read affirmations that pertain to any topic. This app even has a quality where you can create your own affirmations and revisit them using the app‚Äôs fonts and wallpapers, which adds character and personality to each message.', 'author': 'Karicloou', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'So positive and easy', 'content': 'I love how easy it is to navigate through this app.  And in no time I had built a positive and productive habit.  Recommended for anyone starting on a healing journey!', 'author': 'Ajoji111', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-07', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Some Thoughts', 'content': 'While this app has already helped me in the little I have used it, I do wish I could blacklist words or dismiss certain affirmations that don‚Äôt apply to me. I don‚Äôt have a supportive family and I‚Äôve had many family-based affirmations have popped up, just to name one.', 'author': 'mizitill', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Ur mom', 'content': 'I love it , I can truly grow on me and take the time I need for my personal goals!!!', 'author': 'Sam12811', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-07', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Repeating adds', 'content': 'It keeps showing me the 75 % off menu add if I press cancel it will just come back up and because of this I cannot do anything on the app', 'author': 'üëÇüëÅÔ∏èüëÑüëÅÔ∏èüëÇ', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-06', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Subscription pop up', 'content': 'Subscription pop up is not able to be dismissed. Every time I dismiss it it pops right back up and I‚Äôm unable to see the affirmation.', 'author': 'ohlael1', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-06', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I literally write down everything', 'content': 'Some reason they just hit at the right moment üòå', 'author': 'QUEENB_xxx', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-06', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Apple Watch complication', 'content': 'Hi - there is a problem with category sync on the Apple Watch complication. I selected ‚Äòmy own affirmations‚Äô but keep seeing general ones that are not selected. I‚Äôve reset the app, my phone, my watch numerous time without success. Help?', 'author': 'unicornkitten70', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-06', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è', 'content': 'So far it‚Äôs amazing!', 'author': '_stayrae', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-06', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'So basic, asked tons of questions, but gives Little', 'content': 'Micro three day trial and then a expensive one year subscription, the content is super basic and ask a lot of questions about yourself without giving you much but pretty canned affirmations', 'author': 'Foodie Shutterbug', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-06', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Pretty good app', 'content': 'I just don‚Äôt like that it cost money for some things but other then that it‚Äôs a good app', 'author': 'brooklyn1.01', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-05', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love it but..', 'content': 'Ok, first off really a fan. Been with you guys for a few years now and it‚Äôs been a life changer! Really helped me rebound from a tough spot. 

But the recent updates seem to have limited the usage? I once could practice affirmations with music playing in the background from other apps. And there was an option for voice preference which I enjoyed. The default one now feels flat. Anyway we can get these features back??', 'author': 'Dave _D', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-05', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'ES', 'title': 'APP', 'content': 'Perfecta üëåüèª', 'author': 'Javier Andaluz', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-05', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Expensive and a little too girly', 'content': 'I want to like this app but the free trial is way to short and the price for a subscription is way too high. Also, as a guy, this app is a little girly and doesn‚Äôt always feel very neutral or gender inclusive.', 'author': 'Julius Apple Cheeks', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-04', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'DO NOT USE THIS APP', 'content': 'SCAM. got this app and it signed me up for a $77 subscription on its own, and it‚Äôs non refundable even though I only use the app for the widget as they advertise, and I didn‚Äôt want the subscription. Don‚Äôt buy this app, IT WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY', 'author': 'Elizarch', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-04', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Buggy', 'content': 'I love the app. I have been using it for years, but this version seems buggy. I‚Äôm having issues where it keeps asking me to set up my Apple Watch even though I have done it. It keeps telling me I‚Äôve changed my icon over and over again. Finally, the widget is not following the theme I have set in I Am. 

If you can fix these issues, I‚Äôll give it four starts.', 'author': 'Gritjaw Battlebiter', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Powerful', 'content': 'What a fantastic idea. Whoever thought of this is a genius!', 'author': 'Rob 067', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love', 'content': 'I really do love and appreciate this app so much. It helps seeing it on my Lock Screen every time I look at my phone. I may not always click on it, but I read them every day.', 'author': 'mamaspooky', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Squeezing money out of everything', 'content': 'This apps main feature was that it would say the affirmations out loud so you can repeat them. Now for that same feature that‚Äôs been free the whole time and is its main selling point it‚Äôs a $6 subscription on top of the app now being FULL of pop up ads for the most random slop games. Yeah deleted immediately. I‚Äôll find something else.', 'author': 'NTCImages', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Spy', 'content': 'Life has taught me that you can‚Äôt control someone‚Äôs loyalty. No matter how good you are to them ,it doesn‚Äôt mean that they will treat you the same way. I have been married to my husband for years with no idea he was cheating. Suddenly i started noticing changes in behavior, i suspected something was wrong So i confided in a friend who convinced and introduced me to an hacker. He was able to hack into my husband mobile phone to access his Text messages, Call logs, IG, browser history, deleted messages, Emails and WhatsApp remotely . It seemed as though my life was spinning out of control getting to find out he has someone else. I filed for a divorce just could not continue with his lies. If you feel you have been exploited in your marriage and you need proof. I suggest you contact Wayne Victor on his gmail and thank me later , he‚Äôs into any hacking related issues and can solve all hacking problem expertvictor05 @ gmail.com', 'author': 'Shahs/12', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'ü§¶üèø‍‚ôÇÔ∏è', 'content': 'Man, this app is incredibly buggy. I mean, even when you close the app it runs for a few extra seconds. Tends to freeze up. Terrible.', 'author': 'Blacktago', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '‚ù§Ô∏è', 'content': 'üôè', 'author': 'Hkfjdji', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-03', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Worst app ever for encouraging messages', 'content': 'After over 2 years as a subscriber I dropped my subscription. I consider it a waste of money to have to jump trough hoops daily to get a simple once an hour notification.', 'author': 'Andya-geek', 'version': '5.83.2'}, {'date': '2025-10-02', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Everything is premium', 'content': 'I used to loooove this app and I just recently decided to redownload it to get myself back on track only to find out that all of the fun, cute parts of this app are now blocked under a subscription paywall. Sad. At least there used to be a few free options but I can‚Äôt find any now :/', 'author': 'Court0826', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-02', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I am', 'content': 'It is so good it‚Äôs helping me with not having that much anxiety anymore. If you have, if you have been overthinking having trouble comparing your body to yourselves and if you just need somebody to give you affirmations every day, this is good for you. Everybody in my house has it Even my kids have it and they‚Äôre much older, but it really helps us. Hope you guys can get it too.', 'author': 'peanut5193', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-02', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'Affirmation', 'content': 'Empowering and uplifting.', 'author': 'CheesyCyn', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-02', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Am I missing something?', 'content': 'I had this app a couple of years ago and I really loved it. What I loved about it was that I would get daily affirmations on my watch to help get me through the day. Recently, I‚Äôve revisited the app, but it seems to have changed. Now I have to go into the app and scroll and like different information. I feel like I‚Äôm missing something as this is no better than scrolling on social media. Not something that I want to do.', 'author': 'Janetipie', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-01', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'way too many adds no', 'content': 'The amount of pop up ads is ridiculous. And to remove them a subscription? absolutely not id rather pay for an affirmations app for 5 bucks and have no ads', 'author': 'ChaosFerno', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-01', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Bug', 'content': 'I received 5 notifications all at once about my streak. I do not wish to get these notifications, nor do I wish to partake in any ‚Äústreak‚Äù by opening the app', 'author': 'User10397', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-01', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Unacceptable', 'content': 'I wanted to share some feedback about an affirmation that recently appeared in the app:

‚ÄúI know that ending this is the best thing for me, even if it hurts.‚Äù

While I understand the intention behind it, the wording ‚Äúending this‚Äù can be interpreted in unsafe or harmful ways, especially since many people who use affirmation and wellness apps may already be struggling with mental health challenges. The phrase is vague and could unintentionally be read as a reference to self harm rather than healthy endings.

I thought it had to be a joke when this came up. Please remove this from your generator.', 'author': 'naenerbug', 'version': '6.3.0'}, {'date': '2025-10-01', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Took away the practice', 'content': 'There used to be an option where you can ‚Äúpractice‚Äù and it would read the affirmations to you.And now that‚Äôs no longer available.', 'author': 'Don‚Äôt know how to feel', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-30', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Gives me anxiety', 'content': 'Reading the affirmations are causing me anxiety. It might work for some but not me. I‚Äôm dealing with too much trauma in my life. The affirmations just make me cry. 
What‚Äôs frustrating is I can‚Äôt find where to cancel the app. I can‚Äôt handle receiving anymore messages.', 'author': 'Penetang smurf', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-30', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'First time', 'content': 'First day and I already feel better', 'author': 'Cutie dookie wookie bear', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': 'Beautiful app', 'author': 'QUEENNCHERISH', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-29', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'GB', 'title': 'I am‚Ä¶. Confused‚Ä¶', 'content': 'Some of the affirmations and notifications are really negative‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm confused.. aren‚Äôt this app supposed to feed positive affirmations? Instead they would say things like ‚ÄúI‚Äôm facing a difficult time now, but I can get through it‚Äù but no I‚Äôm not going through a hard time‚Ä¶ what‚Äôs your deal lol they gave you prompts when you set it up, I chose manifest abundance, gratitude, and positive thinking, why are you keep feeding me negative thoughtsü§¶üèª‍‚ôÄÔ∏è', 'author': 'Veiieneodoren_1222', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-28', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Morning Routine', 'content': 'Thank you for making this app, I use it as a part of my moment reset each day to focus and declare the things that set my day. However, as a premium user, I continue to have glitches with my apple watch face. Even more, now that I have the Apple 11- it won‚Äôt even let me add the compilation. If this was fixed and I could use the full version that I am paying for, I would give it a 5.', 'author': 'candytree82', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-28', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Reminders/notifications', 'content': 'Paid for year subscription, all of a sudden notifications stopped, tried adjusting settings, still not working', 'author': 2231994, 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-28', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'GB', 'title': 'Annoying', 'content': 'I understand you want to customise at the beginning but the number of questions you ask is ridiculous. Make it less. I know I can skip but it‚Äôs tooo much. I. A  just installed on iPad - makes me not want to use it. Yes, triggered but seriously - too much.', 'author': 'popoutta', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Uplifting Affirmations', 'content': 'I love seeing the ‚ÄúI Am‚Äù notifications throughout the day. They always seem to come at the perfect times. The affirmations are so positive and uplifting. I really enjoy reading them and seeing all of the beautiful, inspiring messages that ‚ÄúI Am‚Äù offers.', 'author': 'Daddy and Crystal‚Äôs Reviews', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Confidence', 'content': 'It makes me more confident ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èüí´', 'author': 'Swimmerbaddie', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'This app is the best!', 'content': 'I feel more confident in myself and, I truly love myself a lot more and, I‚Äôve had this app for 1 minute and I already feel good! (Not Ai)', 'author': 'AmeliaLuv7', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'GB', 'title': 'Too many interruptions', 'content': 'I love this app and regularly use it. What ruins it for me are the constant reminders - not wanted or needed - that I can add an affirmation to my favourites. As I‚Äôm a long time user and using my favourites list anyway, this is unnecessary, jarring & irritating. I‚Äôd love an option to remove unwanted notifications. Or send them once only. Once is plenty.', 'author': 'Tired mum needs rest!', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Instant healing', 'content': 'I‚Äôve been to many therapists and spoken to many about my problems and struggles. No one has ever been able to help me. Shortly after downloading this app, it has worked INSTANTLY! Tailored to my own settings, it gives me the peace and calm to clear my mind in order to medicate and absorb the affirmations for the day. Very thankful I have found this app and will definitely be using it!', 'author': 'Cooli03', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Need assistance', 'content': 'Please I need someone of customer service or something to contact me', 'author': 'Morales1722', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I love this so much', 'content': 'It‚Äôs a small, daily reminder of how important I am to myself.  Comes when I need them most.', 'author': 'Lissette M.', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-26', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': "This app gives me hope that one day I'll be able to completely love myself", 'author': 'Chesney12612', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-25', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'ES', 'title': 'Te cobran', 'content': 'Entiendo que haya que pagar pero solo son leer frases. No s√© qu√© beneficios tiene', 'author': 'Jose ay bibet', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-24', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Streaks don‚Äôt work correctly', 'content': 'Great app but the streaks need an option to opt out. I look at this app literally every day. I click and favorite sayings. Every hour it pops up on my wrist. It still keeps ending my streaks. Idk how to keep them going or why it has to be an issue. 

Fine whatever. Then let me disable the option of having streaks so it‚Äôs not glitching and nagging me in the first place.  Makes me want to delete the app.', 'author': 'Jenimeh', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-24', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'I love this app', 'content': 'Such a beautiful app! It keeps me grounded.', 'author': 'Marley12392', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-24', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Daily Devotional', 'content': 'These affirmations get me by daily \U0001fa77', 'author': 'Tay3679', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è', 'content': 'LOVE IT!!! So relaxing and boosts confidence and self esteem!!!', 'author': 'LGS‚ù§Ô∏è6Ô∏è‚É£7Ô∏è‚É£', 'version': '6.2.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'It really does help', 'content': 'As a person with mental health issues this app helps <3', 'author': 'Daughter of Athena üíû', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-23', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Too many prompts', 'content': "There's too many prompts just to get to the trial phase.", 'author': 'NeecyBabyyyyyyy', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Fab', 'content': 'Really just a great app. Can you make a wallpaper that changes affirmations constantly and maybe Lock Screen widgets.', 'author': 'Cricketindebt', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-22', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'FREE TRIAL?', 'content': 'Accepted free trial and it immediately charged me $10.99 USD. Luckily it failed.', 'author': 'Angusmca360', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-22', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'ES', 'title': 'Very short trial is suspicious', 'content': 'This app, if it works, is for the long term. So why such a super short trial and pressure to buy? It‚Äôs not cheap, it‚Äôs long term. Insisting on purchase gives me the impression that you are concerned that after a week people won‚Äôt buy it. I prefer to pass. 

Note also that it is strangely identical to I Am which is 1/3 cheaper.', 'author': 'ValdoPolaroil', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I love this app', 'content': 'This app is helping me so much I love it with everything Im going through right now', 'author': 'Stitch lover61', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'My mental checker', 'content': 'The program help me stay focused on things that during the course of the day that might get lost from all the chaos on this  planet', 'author': 'Masufa', 'version': '6.1.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-21', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'A couple issues but still love', 'content': 'I downloaded this app because my best friend recommended it to me. I haven‚Äôt had very many issues with it personally, but I notice the widget affirmations never match up with the affirmations I choose in the app. Also, today one of the widget affirmations used a very vulgar word that should not even be used in such an app. I hope that you fix this because I feel more people will download this app if you do. Other than that, this app has been very helpful to me!
